name: gitlab-runner
description: GitLab Runner runs tests and sends the results to GitLab. GitLab CI is the open-source continuous integration service included with GitLab that coordinates the testing.
preInstallNotes: You need a running instance of either GitLab CE or EE. Also, you need to specify the Runner Token (available on GitLab -> Admin -> Runners), otherwise the runners cannot connect to the GitLab instance.
postUninstallNotes: GitLab Runner has been uninstalled. Thanks for using it!
